page.title: 09Ghosts
page.content: There are a number of ghost stories connected with the area but few have any real substance. The only one which appears to have been written about is the "Cross Yates Boggle".The story goes that one night while walking home from the pub a man saw something white going into the shadow of an ash tree.The story was used to frighten people but the presence of a white horse in the vicinity would indicate that the story, despite its following, is to be taken very much tongue in cheek. There is also another ghost or "Boggle" that is supposed to haunt Scalla Beck.
